solution_line_template: Over the four hours, the tank loses {water_lost_per_hour} * {total_hours} = <<{water_lost_per_hour}*{total_hours}={total_water_lost}>>{total_water_lost} gallons of water.
Hayden adds a total of {water_added_hour3} + {water_added_hour4} = <<{water_added_hour3}+{water_added_hour4}={total_water_added}>>{total_water_added} gallons of water.

At the end of the four hours, there is {initial_water} - {total_water_lost} + {total_water_added} = <<{initial_water}-{total_water_lost}+{total_water_added}={water_left}>>{water_left} gallons of water left in the tank.
